mods.abstract: This might be cited as one of the reasons the duck limit this past season was only four per day, or possession limit of eight for two days. The above is a pictured result of a duck hunt BEFORE there was a limit or federal control.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
